summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Thursday 9 December to end of Thursday 9 December GMT
description: A mostly dry with a bright start Thursday, though cold. Winds will be mostly light before a band of rain and strong winds approaches from the west later.<br/><br/>A fresh westerly Atlantic breeze ensuring good dispersion of any local emissions.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
